Everything is on it, everything that I need. I do still always make sure anything that I have on this, I have it backed up to a separate drive because my sister, back in the day, she got her computer stolen and she didn't have a bunch of video files on that computer backed up. And that is just kind of like always in the back of my mind, like if this goes away, I still have a backup of all of what is important on there. So that is a word of advice to anybody, just because you have the space, yes, you should use it but you should always have a backup somewhere else. But then I was traveling so much that I really had no other choice and at that time, I didn't know that this was in our future.
